Seven Kingdoms: Conquest offers strategy fans the choice to play as human
or demon in epic battles spanning 6,000 years on Earth. Starting in ancient
Egypt in 3000 B.C. and ending in a final battle on a futuristic Earth,
players will have to have their fingers on the pulse of their civilization
as the two races clash every 1,000 years.

System requirements:

    * Windows 98, 2000, ME, XP or Vista (Windows 95 and NT not supported)
    * 1.4 GHz CPU
    * RAM: 512 MB
    * Hard Drive: 1 GB
    * VIDEO CARD: NVIDIA GeForce FX series, ATI Radeon 8500, or 3D cards of the same grade
